ai-mil3.7.8:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, one who knows a bad and doing bad deeds, from one who knows a bad and who does a bad deed,”
ai-mil3.7.8:1.3_0: The senior monk said, “They’re doing bad deeds.”
ai-mil3.7.8:1.4_0: “Well then, sir, from that Nāgadatta or their minister, while he’s still a wicked person, I do bad deeds of the day.”
ai-mil3.7.8:1.5_0: “What do you think, great king? When you’re burning, blazing, and glowing, why do you think?”
ai-mil3.7.8:1.6_0: “If someone were to take it, I’d become a stronger.”
ai-mil3.7.8:1.7_0: “In the same way, anyone who does bad deeds, but does a bad deed, for what they don’t know.”
ai-mil3.7.8:3.1_0: knowingly the eight enquirys of (performed) births is the eighth (birth) question.
